property_title: Villas for sale, in region 15, tulum.

Great development of 54 villas fully equipped and furnished*, in the area of ​​best surplus value of Tulum, region 15, 5 minutes from the crystalline beaches of the Mexican Caribbean, 3 minutes from the center of Tulum, 7 minutes from the archaeological ruins and 20 minutes from the Tulum International Airport, unbeatable location.

Our villas have the Lock OFF system, which will allow you to diversify your investment in vacation income, to achieve a better ROI of your investment.

Character
• 3 bedrooms with LOCK OFF System, with independent access.
• 3.5 bathrooms
• Kitchen in PB and Cocineta in Rooftop
• Room and dining room
• 2 private pools
• Rooftop with pool, bedroom, bathroom and kitchen

property_title: Gran Villa with Beach Club and Golf Campo in the Riviera Maya
property_description:
Exclusive real estate development located in the heart of the Riviera Maya, with an extension of 236 hectares, includes the Gran Coyote golf course with 72 hectares of which half are nature reserve, designed by the PGA legend and member of the Hall of Fame Nick Price.

The location in front of the Caribbean Sea is spectacular, the best of Playa del Carmen, with beach club, pools and all the facilities of a luxury development, has controlled access and surveillance 24/7.

Our villas are customizable inside, taking care of the smallest detail to achieve balance and harmony in the best luxury stay that the Riviera Maya can offer.

One destination encompasses soaring mountain peaks, an idyllic tropical landscape, sandy shores and rolling, green flatlands. Designed to coalesce with the diverse and stunning landscape, Mandarina will be a place for residents and guests to gather and celebrate a rare sense of freedom, a shared love of the outdoors and a destination of remarkable natural wonder.

ONE&ONLY PRIVATE HOMES
Surrounded by vistas of lush mountainsides and the Pacific Ocean, One&Only Private Homes is a collection of 55 villas—among the first One&Only villas to own in the world.

Harmonizing eloquently with the landscape, villas feature innovative architecture and contemporary design, seamlessly integrating with nature by blending indoor and outdoor living. property_description:
Villa Beach Dreaming is a shelter against the sea that combines elegance, amplitude and privacy in a tropical environment full of light, marine breeze and the constant sound of the waves.

Located in the growing coastal community of Cuyutlán, just 30 minutes from Manzanillo and Tecomán, this furnished town and ready to live is ideal as a permanent residence or as an investment for vacation income.

Its resort type design revolves around a spectacular tile pool with jacuzzi and a central palapa that divides and connects both buildings.

The southern building houses the main kitchen: a gourmet space with two stoves, two ovens and central island, which is integrated with an open room towards a wide terrace in the form of “L”, perfect for coexistence in front of the sea.

Each space has been thought of by travelers from the world, with unique details, well -distributed storage areas and a wide garage with work area.

Villa Playa Soñada is a beachfront retreat that blends elegance, space, and privacy in a tropical setting filled with natural light, ocean breezes, and the soothing sound of waves. Comprising two solid two-story buildings, this property is thoughtfully designed for family living, entertaining large groups, or enjoying peaceful getaways in total comfort.

Located in the growing coastal town of Cuyutlán—just 30 minutes from Manzanillo and Tecomán—this fully furnished, move-in-ready villa is perfect as a year-round home or a profitable vacation rental.

Its resort-style layout centers around a stunning tiled pool with jacuzzi and a palapa that connects the two wings. The north building features, on the ground floor, a large bunk/game room with kitchenette and full bathroom, plus a guest bedroom with twin beds that convert into a king, also with its own bath. Upstairs, you'll find three more bedrooms—one with a private balcony and ensuite bathroom, and two that share a spacious double-sink bath. A covered terrace links all rooms with ocean views.

The south building houses the main kitchen: a gourmet space with two ovens, two stoves, custom cabinetry, and a central island that opens to the living room and an L-shaped covered terrace overlooking the ocean and pool—ideal for gatherings or retreats. A curved staircase leads to the expansive primary suite, complete with sliding glass doors and a private balcony with stunning views.

Designed by world travelers, every detail has been considered—from custom bedroom finishes to ample storage and a generous garage with workspace. This home offers everything needed to live, relax, and entertain without compromise.
property_excerpt: Villa Beach Dreaming is a shelter against the sea that combines elegance, amplitude and privacy in a tropical environment full of light, marine breeze and the constant sound of the waves.
